sentences.chinese: 狼者，言萬物可度量，斷萬物，故曰狼。
sentences.literal: Wolf ones, speak ten thousand things can measure quantity, cut ten thousand things, therefore called Wolf.
Cool wind dwells southwest corner, governs earth.
Earth ones, sink seize ten thousand things qi also.
Sixth month also, pitchpipe middle Lin Zhong.

sentences.chinese: 林鐘者，言萬物就死氣林林然。
sentences.literal: Lin Zhong ones, speak ten thousand things approach death qi Lin Lin appearance.
Its at twelve branches is Wei.

sentences.chinese: 未者，言萬物皆成，有滋味也。
sentences.literal: Wei ones, speak ten thousand things all complete, have flavors also.

sentences.chinese: 罰者，言萬物氣奪可伐也。
sentences.literal: Fa ones, speak ten thousand things qi seize can attack also.

sentences.chinese: 參言萬物可參也，故曰參。
sentences.literal: Shen speak ten thousand things can compare also, therefore called Shen.
Seventh month also, pitchpipe middle Yi Ze.

sentences.chinese: 夷則，言陰氣之賊萬物也。
sentences.literal: Yi Ze, speak yin qi of harm ten thousand things also.
Its at twelve branches is Shen.

sentences.chinese: 申者，言陰用事，申賊萬物，故曰申。
sentences.literal: Shen ones, speak yin use affairs, Shen harm ten thousand things, therefore called Shen.
